name: Visual Calendar 2021
description:
Increase your motivation and productivity by using Visual Calendar 2021.


You can add photos of your projects you have done during the day and view them in a calendar format. The calendar automatically adds the photos you have added to a month, to the year calendar.


Why is this convenient and how can this calendar help you:


  • See which projects are the most time consuming;
  • See your daily project completion count;
  • Motivate yourself by looking at all the projects you have done or haven't done.


I recommend using this calendar with Toggl to see more precise data on how you spend your time.


I've been using this calendar for a month and it has definitely made me more productive and happy. I hope it helps you as much as it helped me.


If you find this calendar helpful please press like so it would be easier to discover by other users.
